title: Google Pixel 2 shut down suddenly (battery 65%) and will not restart!
content:
Hello All,

I purchased my original Google Pixel 2 from an online shop Clevertronic.de in Germany in April 2018
Yesterday night when I was using Whatsapp and just trying to click elswhere, the phone hanged first and then the screen shut down.

SInce then the phone is not restarting. I tried to hold the power button down for 30 seconds. I also tried to hold the power+ volume button down for another 30 seconds. Still the phone seems to be dead.
I also tried to charge the phone for an hour and try again but it still does not work.

I have never dropped the phone directly. Always used an Otterbox casing.

I contacted the online seller i.e. Clevertronic and they said ask Google.
I believe I must have some Warranty since this damage is within a year.

Can someone please help me out? Is it a SW or HW issue? In case you need any more details about the phone then please let me know.

Thank you and have a great day!
